title: Capslock+
description: use import_url or put under ~/.config/karabiner/assets/complex_modifications then add in preferences

to.shell_command: (pgrep Chrome && open -a 'Google Chrome') || (pgrep 'Microsoft Edge' && open -a 'Microsoft Edge') || (pgrep 'Orion' && open -a 'Orion') || (pgrep 'Firefox' && open -a 'Firefox')

(pgrep Electron && open -a 'Visual Studio Code') || (ps p $(pgrep idea) | grep 'IDEA CE' && open -a 'IntelliJ IDEA CE') || (pgrep idea && open -a 'IntelliJ IDEA') || (ps p $(pgrep app_mode_loader) | grep -o '\(Codespaces\|code-server\)\( [0-9]\)\?.app' | xargs -I{} open -a '{}')
osascript -e 'tell app "Terminal" to do script "$HOME/.local/bin/gvim && killall Terminal"'
